cma.$: What city (CMA) do you currently reside in?

permanentResident.$: How long ago did you land in Canada?

arrivalAge.$: How old were you when you landed in Canada?

ethnicGroup.$: Are you White, Indigenous or a member of a racialized community? Please select the group that you identify with most.
ethnicGroup.racialized: Racialized group such as Black, Chinese, Arab, etc.

birthSex.$: What is your sex at birth?

spokenLanguage.$: Which official languages can you conduct a conversation in?

education.$: What is the highest level of education that you have completed?
education.noDegree: Less than high school diploma or its equivalent
education.highSchool: Secondary (high) school diploma or equivalency certificate
education.trades: Apprenticeship or trades certificate or diploma
education.college: College, CEGEP or other non-university certificate or diploma
education.belowBachelors: University certificate or diploma below bachelor level
education.aboveBachelors: University certificate or diploma above bachelor level

job.professional: Professional jobs (that usually call for a degree from a university, such as doctors, dentists, and architects.)
job.technical: Technical jobs and skilled trades (that usually call for a college diploma or training as an apprentice, such as chefs, plumbers, and electricians.)
job.intermediate: Intermediate jobs (that usually call for high school and/or job-specific training, such as industrial butchers, long-haul truck drivers, and food and beverage servers.)
job.labour: Labour jobs (that usually give on-the-job training, such as fruit pickers, cleaning staff, and oil field workers.)

grossIncome.$: What is your best estimate of your annual total personal income, before taxes and deductions, from all sources?
